verbose_text: Two factors have been suggested as triggers for medial remodelling : mutations in bone morphogenetic protein receptor 2 [BMPR2], implicated in the genesis of the disease [XREF_BIBR] and vascular smooth muscle cells in PAH expressing higher levels of serotonin that promotes vasoconstriction, cell growth and enhances hypoxia induced remodelling [XREF_BIBR].
